title: when do i receive my mistery chest
body: i was just wondering when i get my free mistery chest, i already had riot kayle and all my friends already received the skin i know i probably will receive the frre chest but i am just wondering why i still haven t it

replies.body: Gifts have not finished being distributed, so hang tight!  Stay updated on our progress so far through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  There are a lot of accounts and not everything will be received all at once.  Let me know if you have any questions!
